name: Space Protocol
description:
Welcome to SPACE PROTOCOL, a fast-paced horizontal runner with a Simon-like twist.

You play as a handsome astronaut with an incredible mustache, running away from an alien in yourspaceship's corridors and avoiding obstacles along way. But you gotta keep an eye on them, because each obstacle has a symbol you will need to decode passwords and get through the locked doors before it's too late.

CONTROLS: left click to jump and select symbols.
